name: DevExpenses
description: Project expense tracker for indie devs. Track what you spend per project, export reports, stay in the black.
complaint: I need a simple project expense tracker. Not QuickBooks, not a spreadsheet. Just something where I can log what I spent on each project and see if I'm in the red or black.

name: PunchClock
description: Bare bones time tracker for freelancers. No subscriptions, no bloat. Just start, stop, and bill.
complaint: Looking for a bare bones open source time tracker. Every time tracker I find either wants a subscription, has 500 features I don't need, or both. I just want to start a timer, stop it, and see how long I worked. That's it.

name: OpenClaw Trace
description: Observability dashboard for OpenClaw agents. Watch your AI agents think, act, and ship in real time.
complaint: Running 10+ autonomous agents and I have zero visibility into what they're doing. I need a dashboard that shows me heartbeat status, step counts, errors, and cost per agent in real time.

name: GrowthForge
description: Personal development iOS app landing page. Goal tracking, habit stacking, progress visualization.
complaint: iOS app combining OKRs, habit tracking, journaling with mood tagging, AI coaching, gamification (XP/achievements), and progress analytics. Free, iPhone only.

name: SomeYum
description: Tinder for food recipes. Swipe right to save, left to skip. AI learns your taste with every swipe.
complaint: Recipe apps are overwhelming. I don't want to scroll through 10,000 recipes. Just show me one at a time and let me swipe yes or no. Like Tinder but for food.

name: PhotoSizer
description: Bulk resize product photos for Etsy, Amazon, Shopify, eBay and more. Smart fill, marketplace presets, download all at once.
complaint: Does anyone have a system for resizing product photos for multiple platforms at once? I list to Etsy/Amazon/Shopify etc. Every platform has different image size requirements. I waste about 30-45 minutes per batch.

name: TellMeMo
description: AI meeting assistant that answers questions in real-time from your documents. Action items tracked automatically. Open source, free forever.
complaint: Every meeting I'm scrambling to find answers in docs while someone's asking me a question. I need an AI that sits in the meeting, listens, and pulls answers from my documents in real time.
